name: Tyran
description: This is unusual mix of an RPG and strategy genres, simple to learn, but hard to master non casual gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics with 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
